data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gillung, Jessica P., Winterton, Shaun L. (2011): New genera of philopotine spider flies (Diptera, Acroceridae) with a key to living and fossil genera. ZooKeys 127: 15-27, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.127.1824, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.127.1824
